name: New Boston Post
title: Democrat Lisa Field Wins Third Bristol Special Election By 21 Votes Republican Larry Quintal Calls For Recount
content: Home News Commentary Culture Faith Five Questions Calendar Donate FAQs Home News Commentary Culture Faith Five Questions Calendar Donate FAQs **Democrat Lisa Field Wins Third Bristol Special Election By 21 Votes; Republican Larry Quintal Calls For Recount** Copied Democrat Lisa Field of Taunton is claiming victory over Republican Larry Quintal in the special election for the Third Bristol District seat, winning by just 21 votes — at least according to the unofficial tally. But Quintal isn’t conceding yet. He’s calling for a recount. **Related Stories** Copyright © NewBostonPost. All Rights Reserved.
